main event: An unidentified metallic silver-color object was reported hovering and changing speed during sightings by pilots on 16 and 17 October 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed to be approximately 25 feet in diameter, and metallic in color,It hovered for around 1 second before accelerating away,The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes,Multiple pilots coordinated their observations during a training mission,Similar sightings in the area have led to speculation about balloons being used by enemy forces.
witness description: instructor pilot and instructor navigator of the 6127th Training Group
